original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary:
"British Ambassador to the US encourages Ukrainian President Zelensky to show flexibility in peace negotiations with Russia, suggesting that security guarantees from the West could help him overcome domestic opposition."

"Bolivian President Luis Arce accuses the US of using the 'war on drugs' as a pretext for political and economic domination in Latin America, criticizing the recent deployment of American armed forces in the southern Caribbean region."</s>
